org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.tapAndHoldProcessor
Class TapAndHoldProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.AbstractComponentProcessor
      org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.AbstractCursorProcessor
          org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.tapAndHoldProcessor.TapAndHoldProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<AbstractComponentProcessor>, IMTInputEventListener, IInputProcessor
public class TapAndHoldProcessor
extends AbstractCursorProcessor

The Class TapAndHoldProcessor. Multi-Touch gesture which is triggered after touching and resting the finger on the same spot for some time. Fires TapAndHoldEvent gesture events.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

cursorLocked

public void cursorLocked(InputCursor c,
                         IInputProcessor lockingAnalyzer)
Description copied from class: AbstractCursorProcessor
This method is called if a input processor with a higher locking-priority than this one sucessfully locked the specified cursor. If this cursor was used in this input processor, we have to stop using it until it is unlocked by the other processor!

Specified by:
cursorLocked in class AbstractCursorProcessor
Parameters:
c - the cursor
lockingAnalyzer - the locking processor

cursorUnlocked

public void cursorUnlocked(InputCursor c)
Description copied from class: AbstractCursorProcessor
This method is called if a input processor with a higher locking-priority than this one removes his lock on the specified cursor (i.e. because the conditions for continuing the gesture aren't met anymore). This gives this input processor the chance to see if it can use the cursor and try to lock it again.

Specified by:
cursorUnlocked in class AbstractCursorProcessor
Parameters:
c - the cursor

getMaxFingerUpDist

public float getMaxFingerUpDist()
Gets the max finger up dist.

Returns:
the max finger up dist

setMaxFingerUpDist

public void setMaxFingerUpDist(float maxFingerUpDist)
Sets the maximum allowed distance of the position of the finger_down event and the finger_up event that fires a click event
This ensures that a click event is only raised if the finger didnt move that far during the click.

Parameters:
maxFingerUpDist - the max finger up dist

getHoldTime

public long getHoldTime()
Gets the time (in ms.) needed to hold to successfully tap&hold.

Returns:
the Hold time

Sets the holding time for the gesture.

Parameters:
tapTime - the new hold time
